content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: LBTOXGR
      operator: matches_regex
      value: .*[a-zA-Z].*     # identifiers string contains characters
    - name: LBTOXGR
      operator: matches_regex
      value: .*[0-9].*      #identifies that string also contains a number  
Core:
  Id: CORE-000169
  Version: '1'
  Status: Published
Description: Raise a warning when LBTOXGR is not numeric
Outcome:
  Message: Verify that LBTOXGR value is not from a numeric scale
  Output Variables:
    - LBTOXGR
    - LBTOX
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0185
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: '"If value is from a numeric scale, represent only
                  the number  (e.g., "2" and not "Grade 2")."'
                Document: IG v3.4
                Section: 6.3.5.6
                Item: Specification
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - FINDINGS
  Domains:
    Include:
      - LB

json.Description: Raise a warning when LBTOXGR is not numeric

Outcome.Message: Verify that LBTOXGR value is not from a numeric scale

Citations.Cited_Guidance: "If value is from a numeric scale, represent only the number  (e.g., "2" and not "Grade 2")."
